transcript:
Customer: Hello, theek hai ji.
Executive: Hello, sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Hello. Good afternoon.
Executive: Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ji badhiya.
Executive: Main Roshan baat kar raha hun sir Indiamart office se.
Customer: Ji ji ji boliye.
Executive: Ji. Sir wo mail ka main wait kar raha tha aapne mail kara nahi abhi tak.
Customer: Main bhul gaya tha. Theek hai, aaj karwa deta hun.
Executive: Please wo mail kar dijiye. Aapko jo bhi changes chahiye, aap jo bhi action le rahe ho, aap domain change karwana chahte ho, to please aap agar koi bhi available domain hoga na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To koi bhi domain aap check kar lijiyega. Jaise ye hota hai na GoDaddy pe.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Koi domain aap batayenge kya jo aap aap chunna chahte ho?
Customer: A, abhi kya hai mera trade India ka hai domain.
Executive: Trade India ka domain hai aapke paas mein available? To wo chal nahi raha website usme?
Customer: Wo chal raha hai na, wo to chalu hai.
Executive: To wo chalu hai to chalu wala hum nahi kar sakte na sir.
Customer: Achcha wo use nahi kar sakte kya?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Chaliye na dusra aur ek domain pe kaam chalu hai. Main uska bhi dekhta hun main baat karke. Aap koi bhi ek naya domain book karke hame de de jo aap chalana chahte hain.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? To please aap book karke de de taki hum us pe kaam kar sake. Aapko jo bhi requirement hai aap mujhe clearly mail kar dijiye. Maine mail ID aapko already bhej diya hai, right?
Customer: Ji, okay.
Executive: Meri mail ID to aapko mil gayi hai na?
Customer: Haan mil gayi, mil gayi.
Executive: Haan, please aap use bhej dijiyega. Dusri cheez sir main ek cheez aur bhi jaanna chah raha tha, abhi to service hamari thodi bahut jo bhi chal rahi hai, to ye service aap use kyun nahi karte ho?
Customer: Use matlab mere paas proper team nahi thi. Hamara kaise wo pura abhi counter sale chalu tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ye Deepawali ka. Haan. Mera manufacturing unit hai to Deepawali mein kaise jitne mere paas labour hai 200 250 wo sab pura usme busy the.
Executive: Abhi Deepawali ke baad 15 din 20 din jaisa hai band rehta hai.
Customer: Achcha. Factory. Abhi chalu ho raha hai to abhi wo sales team wagera sab join hone ke baad fir se wo chalu kar denge bookings.
Executive: Achcha. To sir abhi aapke paas mein Indiamart ka application hai kya?
Customer: Hai na.
Executive: Ek bari aap open karenge please?
Customer: Ek minute open karta hun.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Aap buyleads mein jaiye.
Customer: Buyleads.
Executive: Yaha pe dekhiye kuch buyleads aapko dikh rahi hogi.
Customer: Abhi ye Hyderabad Telangana ka hai colorful cracker. Haan to koi bhi leads aapko jo dikh rahi hai na, at least aap char panch buyleads consume kar lijiye ye bahut zaruri hai.
Executive: Theek hai kar lenge. Main line pe hi hun wo aap kijiye sir main line pe hi hun.
Executive: To aap pan India mein deal karte ho?
Customer: Haan pan India.
Executive: Achcha. To ye pehle sir do char aap pehle karo fir main aage ki baat batata hun aapko.
Customer: Kar diya hai.
Executive: Haan aapka sir ek product hai Siren three piece Murga Siren Cracker.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Iska jo price aapne unit mein box dal rakha hai, ye box mein aata hai ki aur pieces mein per costing kitni hoti hai?
Customer: Packet mein aata hai wo.
Executive: Kitna packet ka kya costing hoti hai?
Customer: Abhi usme kitna hai rate?
Executive: 165.
Customer: Wo packet ka rate hai teen piece ka packet.
Executive: Achcha per pack hota hai na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Chaliye ye update kar diya. Aapke ek second, abhi bhi galat aa raha hai sir. Per unit price.
Executive: Ye update kar diya maine.
Executive: Ek bari wo na sir aap ye sabse pehle to aap mujhe mail karo. Sabse important. Pehle service agar aapko like karwana hai to please aap ise like karwaye. Dusri cheez jaise hi ye wala mamla khatam ho jata hai ek bar ko hum team wagera pe baith ke will start working ki ek bar aapke catalog pe bhi hame kaam karna hai.
Customer: Ji okay.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Right.
Executive: To please thoda sa sir ye priority pe aap mujhe mail karwa dijiye sir.
Customer: Okay karwata hun. Hai na? Baki kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hogi. Achcha sir ek baat batao aap.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Ji boliye. Aapne jo sir ke sath mein discussion kara tha legal team ke sath mein unhone kya bola tha aapko?
Customer: Unhone udhar unko reply kiya hai ki wo hum wo website pe sale nahi kar rahe bas marketing kar rahe.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan ban sale karne ke upar hai marketing karne ke upar nahi hai. Jaise ki product wo customer waha se direct jo buy karta hai na add to card buy karna. Haan ha. Ye item pe ban hai firework online selling. Achcha. Ji. Okay. To aap mujhe mail kar dijiye ki waha pe jo hai wo cheez hum karte ja rahe hain. Meanwhile please change my domain to this.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Jaisa hota hai isko karwate hain sir.
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai. Aap mail priority pe please kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay ji okay main abhi ye karke karta hun.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to change domain.

- Customer is not using Indiamart services.

- Customer wants to update product price.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to send the new domain via mail.

- Executive asked to consume buyleads.

- Executive updated the product price.

- Executive discussed catalog work.

- Executive discussed legal team feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a mail with the new domain.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, buyleads, catalog, price, legal
